lead_paragraph: Juergen Klopp suggested on Sunday that everyone needed to stay cool amid the crescendo of excitement that is building up around Liverpool's title challenge.

headline.print_headline: Klopp Wants Liverpool to Stay Cool Amid Growing Excitement
headline.main: Klopp Wants Liverpool to Stay Cool Amid Growing Excitement

snippet: Juergen Klopp suggested on Sunday that everyone needed to stay cool amid the crescendo of excitement that is building up around Liverpool's title challenge....
